name: The Aquatic Adventures of the Alien Jelly
name_original: The Aquatic Adventures of the Alien Jelly
description:
Made for the Black and White Jam 11, The Aquatic Adventures of the Alien Jelly is a 2d metroidvania where you play as an alien jelly that fell on earth.

You find yourself on the deep ocean floor, assimilating new life forms to find a way to get back home.

Note: if you get stuck somehow, you can restart your page, the game saves every time you enter a new room.

Assimilate them!

Controls

Note: You won't have everything unlocked at the start.

  • WASD or Directionals to swim
  • Left Shift to dash
  • Mouse to aim and left mouse button to fire
  • E to close tutorials
Credits
  • Environment and Character Art by Poloviiinkin and Kenney
  • Intro music by poinl
  • Game loop music by CleytonKauffman
  • Credits music by MAOU
  • Victory music by cynicmusic
  • Death song by hectavex
  • Playtesting by MissPuppet and friends <3
